info.name: MtblsWs-Py - All POST-ADD Tests
info.description: Only UPDATE methods, those which actually modify data in the server. Should be run with caution, as it may lead to data loss (when run in PROD) or inconsistencies.

item.name: POST New Study Contact
0 - Delete Study Contact - Pub - Auth -> 200 Copy

exec: tests["JSON response key 'firstName' not Null"] = item.firstName;
tests["JSON response key 'lastName' not Null"] = item.lastName;
tests["JSON response key 'email' not Null"] = item.email;
// tests["JSON response key 'address' not Null"] = item.address;
tests["JSON response has key 'role annotationValue'"] = role.hasOwnProperty('annotationValue');
tests["JSON response key 'role annotationValue' not Null"] = role.annotationValue !== null;

response.name: Delete Study Contact - Pub - Auth -> 200

header.name: Access-Control-Allow-Origin
header.description: Specifies a URI that may access the resource. For requests without credentials, the server may specify '*' as a wildcard, thereby allowing any origin to access the resource.

header.name: Content-Length
header.description: The length of the response body in octets (8-bit bytes)

header.name: Content-Type
header.description: The mime type of this content

header.name: Date
header.description: The date and time that the message was sent

header.name: Server
header.description: A name for the server

header.name: Vary
header.description: Tells downstream proxies how to match future request headers to decide whether the cached response can be used rather than requesting a fresh one from the origin server.
